question: JICA signed a Rs.500 crore loan agreement for smarter mobility project to which of the following country?
explanation: Japan International Cooperation Agency (JICA) will provide a concessional loan of Rs.500 crore for smarter mobility project in Chennai to develop Intelligent Transport Systems (ITS). ITSÂ will make traffic management system more efficient to ease the city's congestion. The project will optimise the way traffic lights work and reduce long vehicle queues at city's main intersections.
